name: rnco2

stmt.origin: eqtr4i(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), cima(c0, crn(c1)), crn(cres(c0, crn(c1))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), cima(c0, crn(c1)))
-| wceq(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(cres(c0, crn(c1))))
-| wceq(cima(c0, crn(c1)), crn(cres(c0, crn(c1))))

⊢ ran((c0 ∘ c1))=(c0 " ran(c1))
⊣ ran((c0 ∘ c1))= ran((c0 |` ran(c1)))
⊣ (c0 " ran(c1))= ran((c0 |` ran(c1)))
